title: Dimitar Berbatov
summary: Dimitar Ivanov Berbatov (Bulgarian: Димитър Иванов Бербатов; born 30 January 1981)[3] is a Bulgarian former professional footballer. A striker, he captained the Bulgaria national team from 2006 to 2010, and is the country's all-time leading goalscorer. He is regarded as one of the greatest Bulgarian players of all time.[5] Berbatov became the first Bulgarian ever to play in the Premier League when Tottenham Hotspur bought him from German side Bayer Leverkusen in 2006.
